title: Evaluate and implement documentation tooling for v1.0
description:
Evaluate documentation rendering options (Docsify, MDBook, Jekyll, etc.) and implement chosen solution before v1.0 release.

## Goal

Provide professional, searchable documentation site for v1.0 users while maintaining markdown source for agent accessibility.

## Key Requirements

- Full-text search across all documentation
- Professional appearance and navigation
- Preserve markdown source files (agent-readable)
- Minimal maintenance overhead
- GitLab Pages compatible

## Deliverables

- Evaluation of all viable options (see attached document)
- Decision made and documented
- Chosen solution implemented
- Documentation hosted and accessible
- Maintenance process documented

See attached document for detailed option analysis and recommendation (Docsify).
